test.name: csw:discovery.filter.getrecords.2.1
test.assertion: Correctly evaluate the PropertyIsNotEqualTo predicate expressed by a valid ogc:PropertyIsNotEqualTo element.
test.comment: This test issues a GetRecords request using HTTP POST to the CSW server. The comparison operator PropertyIsNotEqualTo is used for the dct:modified property for a value of '2006-03-26'. If the response returns with the one other record, then the test is valid, otherwise it fails.

request.body: <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" version="2.0.1" resultType="results" outputSchema="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw"> <csw:Query typeNames="csw:Record"> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:PropertyIsNotEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>dct:modified</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>2006-03-26</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsNotEqualTo> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>
